sentences.en: All these patterns of agriculture operate within the context of the global ecosystem.
sentences.cn: 所有这些农业类型,都在全球生态系统的范围内产生作用.

sentences.en: An evaluating index system is established for degenerated estuarine ecosystem restoration.
sentences.cn: 摘要建立了退化河口生态系统恢复评价指标体系.

sentences.en: Chapter 5: With evolution economy as the commercial ecosystem strategy of foundation.
sentences.cn: 第五章: 以演化经济学为基础的商业生态系统战略.

sentences.en: Each ecosystem, however, is continuous to some degree with adjacent systems.
sentences.cn: 然而, 每个生态系统在某种程度上都和邻近的系统是连续的.

sentences.en: I'm the person who watches over the delicate ecosystem of South Park.
sentences.cn: 我是南方公园脆弱生态系统的监视员.

sentences.en: In some climax communities, there is slow accumulation of net ecosystem production.
sentences.cn: 某些顶极群落中也存在缓慢积累的净生态系统生产.

sentences.en: Regional ecosystem types, such as grass land, desert, and deciduous forest, are called biomes.
sentences.cn: 地区的生态系统, 例如草原 、 荒漠和落叶林又被称为生物带.

sentences.en: The abundance and availability of water and nutrients in a soil ecosystem determine its fertility.
sentences.cn: 土壤生态系统中水分和养分的丰度和有效性决定土壤的肥力.

sentences.en: The ecosystem can be redefined as interlocking life systems.
sentences.cn: 生态系统可以再定义为相互关联的生命系统的综合.

sentences.en: The ecosystem will be thrown out of whack.
sentences.cn: 生态系统将会失去平衡。

sentences.en: The global economic system functions like a biological ecosystem.
sentences.cn: 世界经济系统的功能就想生物学上的生态系统.

sentences.en: They are an indispensable part of ecosystem and natural beauty.
sentences.cn: 它们(野生动物)是生态系统和自然美中不可缺少的一部份.

sentences.en: We all have an interest in maintaining the integrity of the ecosystem.
sentences.cn: 维持生态系统的完整是我们共同的利益.

sentences.en: Where there is an ecosystem, there are local experts.
sentences.cn: 哪里有生态系统, 哪里就有本地专家.

sentences.en: You refer to ten major types of land ecosystem in the world.
sentences.cn: 你所指的是世界上十大主要的土地生态系统.

trans.tran_en: all the animals and plants in a particular area, and the way in which they are related to each other and to their environment
